question: In the Posterior abdominal structures, identify the 112 structure. <image 1>
description:
The image is a detailed anatomical illustration of the posterior abdominal structures. The structures are labeled with numbers from 107 to 113. 

- Structure 107 appears to be located near the upper part of the image.
- Structure 108 is situated slightly below and to the right of structure 107.
- Structure 109 is positioned further down and to the right, appearing to be part of the lower abdominal region.
- Structure 110 is located at the bottom of the image, possibly representing a part of the pelvic region.
- Structure 111 is situated in the middle of the image, slightly to the left.
- Structure 112 is located just above structure 111, appearing to be part of the upper abdominal region.
- Structure 113 is positioned to the left of structure 112, also in the upper abdominal region.

Based on this description, structure 112 is located in the upper abdominal region, which corresponds to the options given in the question.
